name: Pickup Truck Driving Desert
description:
Pickup Truck Driving Desert is a free game about racing with traffic cars on the desert sahara highway. This game has realistic car physics with a long (endless) traffic road. You can drive on the highway overtaking car traffic at bright day light but don't crash and reach the next checkpoint in time
Features:
- Realistic car damages,
- Amazing graphics,
- View from top of the car
- Amazing 3D graphics
- Realistic car driving physics
